CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 28, 1946, pg. 19, reads: "Going Great - The Four Tones, one of Pittsburgh's ace combos, is currently drawing the crowds to the swank City Club in McKeesport. They are going into their thirteenth week at this spot.  Left to right: Mildred Stern, pianist; C. E. Fisher, tenor saxist and leader; Merle Pace, guitarist, and Henry Hurt, drummer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of The Four Tones, from left: guitarist Merle Pace, drummer Henry Hurt, tenor saxophonist C. E. Fisher, and pianist Mildred Stern, posed in Loendi Club
